The claim conflates provisions of the CO: 19 relief bill with provisions of a separate omnibus spending bill, both of which were part of a larger $2.3 trillion package approved by Congress.
The COVID: 19 relief bill did not include funding for foreign governments or American arts centers. Such funding was part of the $1.4 trillion omnibus spending bill.
The claim is based on a Facebook post th: 600 stimulus checks for the American people, creating a misleading comparison.
While it is valid to question the alloca: it is incorrect to suggest that the funding for foreign aid and American arts centers is part of the COVID-19 relief bill.
